recipe.title: Jícama Slaw
ingredients: 1 medium red onion, finely chopped (3/4 cup)
2 1/2 pound jicama, peeled and cut into julienne strips (9 to 10 cups)
instructions: Soak onion in 1 cup cold water with 1/2 teaspoon salt 15 minutes (to make onion flavor milder). Drain in a sieve, then rinse under cold water and pat dry.
Whisk together lime juice, oil, sugar, pepper, and remaining 3/4 teaspoon salt in a large bowl until combined well. Add onion, jicama, cilantro, and salt to taste and toss well.
